This is my first pull request. I noticed that there isn't any way to set the ps_strategy in tf.train.replica_device_setter if tf.estimator.Estimator is used in distributed settings. I guess the best way to notify the estimator which strategy to use is through the RunConfig class. I have added a property ps_strategy to RunConfig and filled in some of the unit tests. I have also modified the _get_replica_device_setter in estimator.py to return a device setter with the ps_strategy included. Please kindly review and let me know if there is anything I need to correct or modify

…gy in estimator

This is my first pull request. I noticed that there isn't any way to set the `ps_strategy` in `tf.train.replica_device_setter` if `tf.estimator.Estimator` is used in distributed settings. I guess the best way to notify the estimator which strategy to use is through the `RunConfig` class. I have added a property `ps_strategy` to `RunConfig` and filled in some of the unit tests. I have also modified the `_get_replica_device_setter` in `estimator.py` to return a device setter with the `ps_strategy` included. Please kindly review and let me know if there is anything I need to correct or modify
